text: Styria ( ; ; Croatian and ; ) is a state in the southeast of Austria. The capital city is Graz. It borders Slovenia. In 2016 there were about 1,232,000 people living in Styria. == Districts == The state has 12 districts and a statutory city. === Statutory City === * Graz === Districts === * Bruck- Mürzzuschlag * Deutschlandsberg * Graz-Umgebung * Hartberg-Fürstenfeld * Leibnitz * Leoben * Liezen with the subdistrict Gröbming * Murau * Murtal * Südoststeiermark * Voitsberg * Weiz
title: Styria
